results.text:
WHIRLPOOL

Rank: 1

Diameter: [[4d10]] ft.

Velocity: 5 ft.

DIFFICULTY CLASSES

DC 5 - Stength (Athletics) check

DC 5 - Group Check for a Ship whose length is less than the whirlpool's diameter.

CHECKS

The Captain: Intelligence (water vehicles)

First Mate: Charisma (Intimidation)

Bosun: Strength (carpenter's tools)

Quartermaster: Wisdom (Nature)

Crew: [[1d20]]
